Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

<!-- more -->

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

# 

## 



 $f(x)=C$ $C$ $(-\infty,+\infty)$

### 

{% asset_img constant-function-example-1.png 300 300 %}

$$f(x)=1$$



## 



 $f(x)=x^$$a$ 

### 

 $a$ 

$f(x)=x^{k\frac{m}{n}}(k\in\lbrace-1,1,0\rbrace,m,n\in{N}^{*})$

|       |     |     |  |  |
| :---: | :----: | :----: | :----: | ------ |
| $k=1,m,n$  | $R$ | $R$ |  | {% asset_img power-function-example-1.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=x^\frac{1}{3}$$$$blue:f(x)=x^{3}$$ |
| $k=-1,m,n$  | $(-\infty,0)\cup(0,+\infty)$ | $(-\infty,0)\cup(0,+\infty)$ |  | {% asset_img power-function-example-2.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=x^{-\frac{1}{3}}$$$$blue:f(x)=x^{-3}$$ |
| $k=1,m$ $,n$  | $[0,+\infty)$ | $[0,+\infty)$ |  | {% asset_img power-function-example-3.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=x^{\frac{3}{2}}$$$$blue:f(x)=x^{\frac{1}{2}}$$$$green:f(x)=x^{\frac{5}{2}}$$ |
| $k=-1,m$ $,n$  | $(0,+\infty)$ | $(0,+\infty)$ |  | {% asset_img power-function-example-4.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=x^{-\frac{3}{2}}$$$$blue:f(x)=x^{-\frac{1}{2}}$$$$green:f(x)=x^{-\frac{5}{2}}$$ |
| $k=1,m$ $,n$  | $R$ | $[0,+\infty)$ |  | {% asset_img power-function-example-5.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=x^{\frac{4}{3}}$$$$blue:f(x)=x^{\frac{2}{3}}$$$$green:f(x)=x^{2}$$ |
| $k=-1,m$ $,n$  | $(-\infty,0)\cup(0,+\infty)$ | $(0,+\infty)$ |  | {% asset_img power-function-example-6.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=x^{-\frac{4}{3}}$$$$blue:f(x)=x^{-\frac{2}{3}}$$$$green:f(x)=x^{-2}$$ |
| $k=0$ | $(-\infty,0)\cup(0,+\infty)$ | $\lbrace1\rbrace$ |  | {% asset_img power-function-example-7.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=x^{0}$$$f(x)=x^{0}$  $y=1$  $(0,1)$ |



## 

 $f(x)=b^x$$b$  $b\in(0,1)\cup(1,+\infty)$ $R$ $(0,+\infty)$

 $b^x$  $1$ $x$  $x$ 

### 
|       |     |  |
| :---: | :----: | ------ |
| $0<b<1$ | $(0,+\infty)$ | {% asset_img exponential-function-example-1.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=\frac{1}{2}^x$$$$blue:f(x)=\frac{1}{4}^x$$ |
| $b>1$ | $(0,+\infty)$ | {% asset_img exponential-function-example-2.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=2^x$$$$blue:f(x)=4^x$$ |

### 

####  1



	$e^x=\lim_{n \to \infty}(1+\frac{x}{n})^{n}$



	$e^0=1$

	$e^1=e$

	$e^{x+y}=e^xe^y$

	$e^{xy}=(e^x)^y$

	$\frac{e^x}{e^y}=e^{x-y}$

	$e^{-x}=e^{0-x}=\frac{e^0}{e^x}=\frac{1}{e^x}$

 $x\in{R},y\in{R}$



####  2

 $x$  $e$

$b^x=(e^{\ln{b}})^x=e^{x\ln{b}}$



####  3

 $b>0$ $x$" $b$ "

$b^{\frac{m}{n}=\sqrt[n]{b^m}}$



$\sqrt[n]{b}=b^{\frac{1}{n}}=(e^{\ln{b}})^{\frac{1}{n}}=e^{\frac{\ln{b}}{n}}$



## 



 $b^x=N(b>0,b\neq1)$ $x$  $b$  $N$  $x=\log_{b}{N}$ $b$  $N$  $b$ $N$ 

 $f(x)=\log_{b}{x}(b>0,b\neq1)$ $(0,+\infty)$ $R$ 

 $x=b^y$ $b$ 

### 
|       |     |  |
| :---: | :----: | ------ |
| $0<b<1$ | $R$ | {% asset_img logarithmic-function-example-1.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=\log_{\frac{1}{2}}{x}$$$$blue:f(x)=\log_{\frac{1}{4}}{x}$$ |
| $b>1$ | $R$ | {% asset_img logarithmic-function-example-2.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=\log_{2}{x}$$$$blue:f(x)=\log_{4}{x}$$ |

### 

- $(1,0)$

-  $0<b<1$  $(0,+\infty)$ $b>1$  $(0,+\infty)$ 

-  $f(x)=\log_{b}{x}(b>0,b\neq1,x>0)$

   $0<b<1,0<x<1$ $f(x)=\log_{b}{x}>0$
  
   $b>1, x>1$ $f(x)=\log_{b}{x}>0$
  
   $0<b<1, x>1$ $f(x)=\log_{b}{x}<0$
  
   $b>1, 0<x<1$ $f(x)=\log_{b}{x}<0$
  
-  $b$ $f(x)=\log_{b}{x}$ $f(x)=b^x$  $y = x$ 

{% asset_img logarithmic-function-example-3.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=\log_{2}{x}$$$$blue:f(x)=2^{x}$$$$green:f(x)=\log_{\frac{1}{2}}{x}$$$$blue:f(x)={\frac{1}{2}}^{x}$$

### 

#### 

$\log_{b}{x}=\frac{\log_{k}{x}}{\log_{k}{b}}$

##### 



$x=b^{\log_{b}{x}}$

 $k$ 

$\log_{k}{x}=\log_{k}({b^{\log_{b}{x}})}$

$\because b^x=N(b>0,b\neq1)$ $x=\log_{b}{N}$

 $(b^x)^t=b^{xt}=N^t\ (t\in{R})$

$xt=\log_{b}{N^t}=t\log_{b}{N}\ (t\in{R})$

$\therefore\log_{k}{x}=\log_{k}{b^{\log_{b}{x}}}=\log_{b}{x}\log_{k}{b}$

$\log_{b}{x}=\frac{\log_{k}{x}}{\log_{k}{b}}$ 



#### 

$\log_{b}{MN}=\log_{b}{M}+\log_{b}{N}$

$\log_{b}{\frac{M}{N}}=\log_{b}{M}-\log_{b}{N}$

##### 

 $M=\beta^{m},N=\beta^{n}$

 $\log_{b}{MN}=\log_{b}({\beta^{m}\beta^{n}})$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}({\beta^{m+n}})$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =(m+n)\log_{b}{\beta}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =m\log_{b}{\beta}+n\log_{b}{\beta}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}{\beta^m}+\log_{b}{\beta^n}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}{M}+\log_{b}{N}$

$\log_{b}{\frac{M}{N}}=\log_{b}{M}+\log_{b}{\frac{1}{N}}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}{M}+\log_{b}{N^{-1}}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}{M}-\log_{b}{N}$



#### 

$\log_{b^N}({x^M})=\frac{M}{N}\log_{b}{x}$

##### 



$\log_{b^N}({x^M})=\frac{\ln{b^N}}{\ln{x^M}}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\frac{N\ln{b}}{M\ln{x}}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\frac{M}{N}\log_{b}{x}$

##### 

#### 

$b^{\log_{b}{x}}=x$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}{b^x}$



#### 

$M^{\log_{b}{N}} = N^{\log_{b}{M}}$

##### 

 $\alpha=\log_{b}{N},\  \beta=\log_{b}{M}$ $b^\alpha=N,\ b^\beta=M, \ (b^\beta)^\alpha=(b^\alpha)^\beta$

$\therefore M^{\log_{b}{N}} = N^{\log_{b}{M}}$



#### 

$\log_{b}{\theta}=\frac{\ln \theta}{\ln b}=\frac{1}{\frac{\ln b}{\ln \theta}}=\frac{1}{\log_{\theta}{b}}$



##

##

$f(x)=x^{k\frac{m}{n}}(k\in\lbrace-1,1,0\rbrace,m,n\in{N}^{*})$

|       |     |     |  |  |
| :---: | :----: | :----: | :----: | ------ |
| $k=1,m,n$  | $R$ | $R$ |  | {% asset_img power-function-example-1.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=x^\frac{1}{3}$$$$blue:f(x)=x^{3}$$ |
| $k=-1,m,n$  | $(-\infty,0)\cup(0,+\infty)$ | $(-\infty,0)\cup(0,+\infty)$ |  | {% asset_img power-function-example-2.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=x^{-\frac{1}{3}}$$$$blue:f(x)=x^{-3}$$ |

| $k=1,m$ $,n$  | $R$ | $[0,+\infty)$ |  | {% asset_img power-function-example-5.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=x^{\frac{4}{3}}$$$$blue:f(x)=x^{\frac{2}{3}}$$$$green:f(x)=x^{2}$$ |
| $k=-1,m$ $,n$  | $(-\infty,0)\cup(0,+\infty)$ | $(0,+\infty)$ |  | {% asset_img power-function-example-6.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=x^{-\frac{4}{3}}$$$$blue:f(x)=x^{-\frac{2}{3}}$$$$green:f(x)=x^{-2}$$ |
| $k=0$ | $(-\infty,0)\cup(0,+\infty)$ | $\lbrace1\rbrace$ |  | {% asset_img power-function-example-7.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=x^{0}$$$f(x)=x^{0}$  $y=1$  $(0,1)$ |



## 

 $f(x)=b^x$$b$  $b\in(0,1)\cup(1,+\infty)$ $R$ $(0,+\infty)$

 $b^x$  $1$ $x$  $x$ 

### 
|       |     |  |
| :---: | :----: | ------ |
| $0<b<1$ | $(0,+\infty)$ | {% asset_img exponential-function-example-1.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=\frac{1}{2}^x$$$$blue:f(x)=\frac{1}{4}^x$$ |
| $b>1$ | $(0,+\infty)$ | {% asset_img exponential-function-example-2.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=2^x$$$$blue:f(x)=4^x$$ |

### 

####  1



	$e^x=\lim_{n \to \infty}(1+\frac{x}{n})^{n}$



	$e^0=1$

	$e^1=e$

	$e^{x+y}=e^xe^y$

	$e^{xy}=(e^x)^y$

	$\frac{e^x}{e^y}=e^{x-y}$

	$e^{-x}=e^{0-x}=\frac{e^0}{e^x}=\frac{1}{e^x}$

 $x\in{R},y\in{R}$



####  2

 $x$  $e$

$b^x=(e^{\ln{b}})^x=e^{x\ln{b}}$



####  3

 $b>0$ $x$" $b$ "

$b^{\frac{m}{n}=\sqrt[n]{b^m}}$



$\sqrt[n]{b}=b^{\frac{1}{n}}=(e^{\ln{b}})^{\frac{1}{n}}=e^{\frac{\ln{b}}{n}}$



## 



 $b^x=N(b>0,b\neq1)$ $x$  $b$  $N$  $x=\log_{b}{N}$ $b$  $N$  $b$ $N$ 

 $f(x)=\log_{b}{x}(b>0,b\neq1)$ $(0,+\infty)$ $R$ 

 $x=b^y$ $b$ 

### 
|       |     |  |
| :---: | :----: | ------ |
| $0<b<1$ | $R$ | {% asset_img logarithmic-function-example-1.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=\log_{\frac{1}{2}}{x}$$$$blue:f(x)=\log_{\frac{1}{4}}{x}$$ |
| $b>1$ | $R$ | {% asset_img logarithmic-function-example-2.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=\log_{2}{x}$$$$blue:f(x)=\log_{4}{x}$$ |

### 

- $(1,0)$

-  $0<b<1$  $(0,+\infty)$ $b>1$  $(0,+\infty)$ 

-  $f(x)=\log_{b}{x}(b>0,b\neq1,x>0)$

   $0<b<1,0<x<1$ $f(x)=\log_{b}{x}>0$
  
   $b>1, x>1$ $f(x)=\log_{b}{x}>0$
  
   $0<b<1, x>1$ $f(x)=\log_{b}{x}<0$
  
   $b>1, 0<x<1$ $f(x)=\log_{b}{x}<0$
  
-  $b$ $f(x)=\log_{b}{x}$ $f(x)=b^x$  $y = x$ 

{% asset_img logarithmic-function-example-3.png 300 300 %} $$red:f(x)=\log_{2}{x}$$$$blue:f(x)=2^{x}$$$$green:f(x)=\log_{\frac{1}{2}}{x}$$$$blue:f(x)={\frac{1}{2}}^{x}$$

### 

#### 

$\log_{b}{x}=\frac{\log_{k}{x}}{\log_{k}{b}}$

##### 



$x=b^{\log_{b}{x}}$

 $k$ 

$\log_{k}{x}=\log_{k}({b^{\log_{b}{x}})}$

$\because b^x=N(b>0,b\neq1)$ $x=\log_{b}{N}$

 $(b^x)^t=b^{xt}=N^t\ (t\in{R})$

$xt=\log_{b}{N^t}=t\log_{b}{N}\ (t\in{R})$

$\therefore\log_{k}{x}=\log_{k}{b^{\log_{b}{x}}}=\log_{b}{x}\log_{k}{b}$

$\log_{b}{x}=\frac{\log_{k}{x}}{\log_{k}{b}}$ 



#### 

$\log_{b}{MN}=\log_{b}{M}+\log_{b}{N}$

$\log_{b}{\frac{M}{N}}=\log_{b}{M}-\log_{b}{N}$

##### 

 $M=\beta^{m},N=\beta^{n}$

 $\log_{b}{MN}=\log_{b}({\beta^{m}\beta^{n}})$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}({\beta^{m+n}})$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =(m+n)\log_{b}{\beta}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =m\log_{b}{\beta}+n\log_{b}{\beta}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}{\beta^m}+\log_{b}{\beta^n}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}{M}+\log_{b}{N}$

$\log_{b}{\frac{M}{N}}=\log_{b}{M}+\log_{b}{\frac{1}{N}}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}{M}+\log_{b}{N^{-1}}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}{M}-\log_{b}{N}$



#### 

$\log_{b^N}({x^M})=\frac{M}{N}\log_{b}{x}$

##### 



$\log_{b^N}({x^M})=\frac{\ln{b^N}}{\ln{x^M}}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\frac{N\ln{b}}{M\ln{x}}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\frac{M}{N}\log_{b}{x}$

##### 

#### 

$b^{\log_{b}{x}}=x$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}{b^x}$



#### 

$M^{\log_{b}{N}} = N^{\log_{b}{M}}$

##### 

 $\alpha=\log_{b}{N},\  \beta=\log_{b}{M}$ $b^\alpha=N,\ b^\beta=M, \ (b^\beta)^\alpha=(b^\alpha)^\beta$

$\therefore M^{\log_{b}{N}} = N^{\log_{b}{M}}$



#### 

$\log_{b}{\theta}=\frac{\ln \theta}{\ln b}=\frac{1}{\frac{\ln b}{\ln \theta}}=\frac{1}{\log_{\theta}{b}}$

$$f(x)=1$$

$f(x)=x^$$a$

$a$

$f(x)=x^{k\frac{m}{n}}(k\in\lbrace-1,1,0\rbrace,m,n\in{N}^{*})$
$k=1,m,n$ $R$ $R$ $$red:f(x)=x^\frac{1}{3}$$$$blue:f(x)=x^{3}$$
$k=-1,m,n$ $(-\infty,0)\cup(0,+\infty)$ $(-\infty,0)\cup(0,+\infty)$ $$red:f(x)=x^{-\frac{1}{3}}$$$$blue:f(x)=x^{-3}$$
$k=1,m$ $,n$ $[0,+\infty)$ $[0,+\infty)$ $$red:f(x)=x^{\frac{3}{2}}$$$$blue:f(x)=x^{\frac{1}{2}}$$$$green:f(x)=x^{\frac{5}{2}}$$
$k=-1,m$ $,n$ $(0,+\infty)$ $(0,+\infty)$ $$red:f(x)=x^{-\frac{3}{2}}$$$$blue:f(x)=x^{-\frac{1}{2}}$$$$green:f(x)=x^{-\frac{5}{2}}$$
$k=1,m$ $,n$ $R$ $[0,+\infty)$ $$red:f(x)=x^{\frac{4}{3}}$$$$blue:f(x)=x^{\frac{2}{3}}$$$$green:f(x)=x^{2}$$
$k=-1,m$ $,n$ $(-\infty,0)\cup(0,+\infty)$ $(0,+\infty)$ $$red:f(x)=x^{-\frac{4}{3}}$$$$blue:f(x)=x^{-\frac{2}{3}}$$$$green:f(x)=x^{-2}$$
$k=0$ $(-\infty,0)\cup(0,+\infty)$ $\lbrace1\rbrace$ $$red:f(x)=x^{0}$$$f(x)=x^{0}$ $y=1$ $(0,1)$

$f(x)=b^x$$b$ $b\in(0,1)\cup(1,+\infty)$ $R$ $(0,+\infty)$

$b^x$ $1$ $x$ $x$

$0<b<1$ $(0,+\infty)$ $$red:f(x)=\frac{1}{2}^x$$$$blue:f(x)=\frac{1}{4}^x$$
$b>1$ $(0,+\infty)$ $$red:f(x)=2^x$$$$blue:f(x)=4^x$$

1

$e^0=1$

$e^1=e$

$e^{xy}=(e^x)^y$

$\frac{e^x}{e^y}=e^{x-y}$

$e^{-x}=e^{0-x}=\frac{e^0}{e^x}=\frac{1}{e^x}$

$x\in{R},y\in{R}$

$\log_{b}{x}=\frac{\log_{k}{x}}{\log_{k}{b}}$

$x=b^{\log_{b}{x}}$

$k$

$\log_{k}{x}=\log_{k}({b^{\log_{b}{x}})}$

$\because b^x=N(b>0,b\neq1)$ $x=\log_{b}{N}$

$(b^x)^t=b^{xt}=N^t\ (t\in{R})$

$xt=\log_{b}{N^t}=t\log_{b}{N}\ (t\in{R})$

$\therefore\log_{k}{x}=\log_{k}{b^{\log_{b}{x}}}=\log_{b}{x}\log_{k}{b}$

$\log_{b}{x}=\frac{\log_{k}{x}}{\log_{k}{b}}$

$\log_{b}{MN}=\log_{b}{M}+\log_{b}{N}$

$\log_{b}{\frac{M}{N}}=\log_{b}{M}-\log_{b}{N}$

$M=\beta^{m},N=\beta^{n}$

$\log_{b}{MN}=\log_{b}({\beta^{m}\beta^{n}})$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}({\beta^{m+n}})$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =(m+n)\log_{b}{\beta}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =m\log_{b}{\beta}+n\log_{b}{\beta}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}{\beta^m}+\log_{b}{\beta^n}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}{M}+\log_{b}{N}$

$\log_{b}{\frac{M}{N}}=\log_{b}{M}+\log_{b}{\frac{1}{N}}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}{M}+\log_{b}{N^{-1}}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}{M}-\log_{b}{N}$

$\log_{b^N}({x^M})=\frac{M}{N}\log_{b}{x}$

$\log_{b^N}({x^M})=\frac{\ln{b^N}}{\ln{x^M}}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\frac{N\ln{b}}{M\ln{x}}$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\frac{M}{N}\log_{b}{x}$

$b^{\log_{b}{x}}=x$

$\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ =\log_{b}{b^x}$

$M^{\log_{b}{N}} = N^{\log_{b}{M}}$

$\alpha=\log_{b}{N},\ \beta=\log_{b}{M}$ $b^\alpha=N,\ b^\beta=M, \ (b^\beta)^\alpha=(b^\alpha)^\beta$

$\therefore M^{\log_{b}{N}} = N^{\log_{b}{M}}$

$\log_{b}{\theta}=\frac{\ln \theta}{\ln b}=\frac{1}{\frac{\ln b}{\ln \theta}}=\frac{1}{\log_{\theta}{b}}$

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

<!-- more -->

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

<!-- more -->

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
